name: Baseball Batterang
description:
Developed for VR Jam 2019

Surrounded by evil ball pitching robots in an enclosed lab, your job is to survive as long as you can, putting to use two prototype electrical boomerang baseball bats in each hand!

You can swing them like normal bats, but you can also throw them, allowing you to do ranged damage. If you don't attack with one bat for a short period of time, it'll charge up and do massive throwback damage to a target when attack! The brighter the bat, the better the damage.

Developed for SteamVR/OpenVR. Should be compatible with any SteamVR/OpenVR compatible headset. Windows x64 only.

Controls:
- Back Trigger: Hold onto Bat. Releasing this releases the bat. 

- Your hands and arms: Swinging the bat (duh).

Credits

Sound effects originally created by artisticdude (you can find them here)

This game uses the Steam VR Plugin for Unity provided by Valve

Programming and 3D assets - Parkraft
